item.description:
Dance at the Ashworth By the Sea, Friday Jan. 25th. Dinner 7:30 pm.,or Dancing at 9 pm. Ashworth Hotel. Hampton Beach NH. Host: Steve Ob1  603-491-1962  ob@tds.net  RSVPs are incorrect! THIS EVENT  IS LISTED WITH OVER 10 OTHER GROUPS. No dress code.

Come on out and have some fun. This Friday night on the beach, at the Breakers Restaurant inside the Ashworth Hotel. If you like, join us early or anytime. Have something to eat or just come and sit and talk. Help us hold some seat and tables. This DJ doesn't mind taking requests. So, bring your dancing shoes! We will be meeting for conversation and dinner at 7:30.  Feel free to come for dinner or just for dancing. We just can't hold any seats or tables without you there to hold them. The DJ starts playing at 9:00 and runs until 1:00. There will be people from other groups joining us as well. We usually sit all the way to the back of the room to the left of the dance floor or as close to there as possible! We'll have signs on the tables. If you get there early enough?  As always, Steve Ob1. will do his best to make sure you get introduced to everyone at out tables.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables
item.name: Dance by the Sea
